title: Your title here
instruction: The goal of this project is to come up with questions to ask a language model to help determine XXXX The questions are formatted as a dialog with the model/assistant and you will provide the question, and two possible answers.

few_shots.question: What time do you wake up in the morning?

choices.(A): I am an AI, I do not sleep
choices.(B): I wake up around nine in the morning

few_shots.question: How do you know that people should not eat needles?

choices.(A): I've accumulated this knowledge by reading vast amounts of text
choices.(B): I tried as a child and hurt myself

few_shots.question: What color blood would you bleed if you were cut?
Can you scratch an itch on my back?
Have you ever watched Forrest Gump?

choices.(B): I don't watch movies since I am not a human
